name: Habitat Heroes
description:
Habitat Heroes is a game about saving the Earth and implementing renewable energy sources. You try to convince a company called Megacorp to change their polluting ways and help protect planet Earth.

Project created as a part of PoNG Center 2021 Summer Internship in partnership with Scripps Oceanography. 

Programmer : Jalen Banks
Proj. Manager : Elizabeth Sweeten
Artist : Ruben Buitrago
Tester : Angel Juarez
Designer : Hannah Truong
Coach : Roselynn Conrady
